law.catch_line: The Sick Leave Incentive Program consists of the following two incentives:...

text.section:
The Sick Leave Incentive Program consists of the following two incentives:
payment for up to 40 hours of unused sick leave per calendar year if an employee has used no more than 40 hours of sick leave during the calendar year and has a sick leave balance of at least 240 hours on December 31 of that calendar year; and
payment for up to 56 hours of unused sick leave per calendar year if an employee has used no more than 24 hours of sick leave during the calendar year and has a sick leave balance of at least 240 hours on December 31 of that calendar year.
To be eligible for the Program, an employee shall maintain a sick leave balance of at least 240 hours after payment is received for leave.

section.section: Leave used for the purpose stated in paragraph (1)(iv) of this subsection shall not be used to determine an employee's leave balance under subsection (b) of this section.
